ygData.subject: Re: Nameless Love-Stonewall Pride UPDATE
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello: Was playing last nite and someone mentioned that there were actual Nameless Love guildies on... *shock*. hehe. I was in on the start of NL.. but most of
ygData.messageBody:
Hello:
Was playing last nite and someone mentioned that there were actual
Nameless Love guildies on... *shock*.
hehe.
I was in on the start of NL.. but most of the regular players merged
into The Nameless of Mercy, our sister guild, as they leveled up into
their 30's and 40's (and beyond)... including myself. I split my
time between Steib (41 druid) and Bliste (44 ranger), so please give
me a tell sometime if you need anything.. ports or whatnot :)
I also have a couple lower lvl alts I've been playing more and would
love it if perhaps one or two of them would be allowed to join your
fold (a 13 DE cleric.. 12 woody warrior.. 5 HE chanter).
Anyways.. glad to see this happening :)
/salute

See u in game :)
Steib

--- In EQ_rainbow@y..., "Alistair" <gameeverquest@a...> wrote:
> Hi folks:
>
> A month ago I posted a message here about the new
> gay/lesbian/bi/trans guild on The Nameless server which was then
> called "Stonewall Pride." After some deliberation (and some wierd
> nerfing which happened to our guild after the last patch) we
decided
> to abandon Stonewall Pride and move everyone into the previously
> existing gay/lesbian guild called Nameless Love. This was at the
> kind invitation of Tsinen, the head of Nameless Love.
>
> Thus gay/lesbian EverQuest people on The Nameless server may wish
to
> join us in the Nameless Love guild to enjoy a safe and friendly
> gay/lesbian environment.
>
> Many of the new Nameless Love members are players of a lower level
> since we have all only recently moved to The Nameless server from
> other servers. We love to group and hang out.
>
> We welcome all gay/lesbian/bi/trans EQers and hope to see you soon!
>
> Dandee Lyon, druid
>
> Ps. Many thanks to Nameless Love for inviting us into their fold.
